capabilities.name: pocket_get_articles
capabilities.description: Fetches the latest unread articles from Pocket API. Returns up to 20 articles by default. You can specify the number of articles to fetch (1-20) using the count parameter. Returns the article ID, title, URL, and excerpt for each article.

capabilities.name: pocket_mark_as_read
capabilities.description: Marks a specific Pocket article as read (archived) using its item ID.
